page.topic: Creating a Custom Control Starting with a ViewBox Control
page.description: The easiest way to create a new Custom Control is to start by creating a ViewBox control and then once you are satisfied with the ViewBox control copy the generated Javascript from the ViewBox builder to the Custom control.

step.description: In the UX Builder on the UX Controls page open the 'Data Controls' menu. Click on the [ViewBox] option to add a viewbox control to the component.
Highlight the ViewBox control in the controls tree. In the properties list on the right click the [...] button next to the 'ViewBox properties' property in the ViewBox Properties section.
From the ViewBox builder, click the Show button at the bottom left corner of the dialog. Then select the 'Javascript code to render ViewBox' menu command.
Copy the code for the 'Settings' object. Click OK. This is the code you will paste into the Settings JSON property in the Custom Control builder.
